title: What would happen if no one went to school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Millions of kids would stay home and work all day or get homeschooled, College kids would get into student debt & waste resources, teachers/professors etc will be out of work, economy staggers, government promotes laws or family benefits if kids go to school, future skill makers in education wouldn’t happen.

Somehow starting with nothing but animal instincts and the knowledge we will die, we built civilization. Having tried it and found it faulty and useless, we will invent it all over again. Having failed once to destroy ourselves, this time we will fail for sure. The final grade? FAIL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! The graders?
